alert.note: Alert for Parker (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 10:01PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Parker County through 1030 PM CDT... At 1001 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cool, or near Mineral Wells, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Weatherford, Mineral Wells, Azle, Briar, Willow Park, Reno, Aledo, Springtown, Brock, Hudson Oaks, Western Lake, Annetta, Poolville, Cool, Lake Mineral Wells, Lake Weatherford, Annetta South, Annetta North, Millsap and Sanctuary. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 390 and 418. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
